```{r}
library(ggforce)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(paletteer)
library(showtext)

font_add_google("Pacifico", "pacifico")
font_add_google("Bebas Neue", "bebas")
showtext_auto()
showtext_opts(dpi = 72)
```


```{r}
word_jan <- c("surpass", "consider", "repent", "deliver", "benefit", "live", "remain", "imitate")

k <- 4
theta <- seq(from = -pi/(2*k), to = 2*pi-pi/(2*k), length.out = k * 50)
x <- cos(k * theta) * cos(theta)
y <- cos(k * theta) * sin(theta)

matthew <- cut(theta, 2*k, labels = word_jan)

df_flower <- tibble(x = x, y = y, matthew = matthew)

plot_legend_labels <- 
  tibble(
    label = word_jan,
    angle_degrees = (90 - 360 * (1:8) / 8),
    angle_radians = angle_degrees * pi / 180,
    angle_text = ifelse(angle_degrees < -90, 
                        angle_degrees+180, 
                        angle_degrees),
    x = 0.5 * cos(angle_radians),
    y= 0.5 * sin(angle_radians)
  )

fill_jan <- tibble(line = word_jan, 
                             fill = pals::parula(8))

plot_legend_data <-
  df_flower %>% 
  left_join(fill_jan, by = c("matthew" = "line")) 



plot_jan <- 
  ggplot(plot_legend_data) +
  geom_polygon(aes(x = x, y = y, 
                   fill = fill, 
                   color = fill), 
               size = 1.1) +
  geom_circle(aes(x0 = 0, y0 = 0, r = 0.2), 
              fill = "#672146", 
              color = "#672146", 
              size = 3.5) +
  geom_text(data = plot_legend_labels, 
            aes(x = x, y = y, label = label, 
                angle = angle_text), 
            color = "#ffdab9", 
            size = 35, 
            family = "pacifico") +
  geom_text(aes(x = 0, y = 0, label = "2021\nJanuary"), 
            color = "#c6f070",  
            size = 20,
            lineheight = 0.3,
            family = "bebas",
            fontface = "bold") +
  scale_fill_identity() +
  scale_color_identity() +
  coord_equal() +
  theme_void() # plot_background(fill = "#bcb7dc")
```
